channel.title: I'm back! Nolan2131's OldSchool Progression Thread!
channel.description:
Well, I'm back on OldSchool from a long break!
[img]http://i76.servimg.com/u/f76/16/16/97/89/310.png[/img]
Current bank - [img]http://i76.servimg.com/u/f76/16/16/97/89/110.jpg[/img]
Current Stats and Quest Points - [img]http://i76.servimg.com/u/f76/16/16/97/89/2_210.png[/img]
Current Goals - [code] 70 Attack for whip 70 Defence for barrows armor 70 Strength for Dharoks Barrows gloves (Currently on Adamant) 80+ range and 70+ prayer for fire cape All skills 30+ and then 40+, so on and so on (Do tears every week) Money for berserker ring Full ranger void + mace Clue scrolls Quest cape ;)? [/code]

item.title: I'm back! Nolan2131's OldSchool Progression Thread!
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

devenb123:

wow lol, if youre looking for somebody to play with pm me : Devenb

Totally man

  • Hit 85 strength
  • Hit 85 Constitution
  • 103 Combat
  • Gained a couple of million since the most recent bank photo

Read full topic

item.title: I'm back! Nolan2131's OldSchool Progression Thread!
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Meh, decided to renew my membership the other week and get some training in before school. Pictures of: QP, skills, items that some people care about, combat level, current outfit, and my succulent organized bank totaling about 30-33m.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm back! Nolan2131's OldSchool Progression Thread!
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:20, topic:533578”][quote author=Strucker link=topic=652371.msg4371414#msg4371414 date=1380758136]

[quote author=arham 4 link=topic=652371.msg4371413#msg4371413 date=1380758043]

Good luck.

Thanks!

wish I could be 12 again and play this shit till my hands fall off

I know right. I had way less responsibilities when I was 12 haha, but this sure has brought back awesome memories. Definitely recommend Old School to those who have not tried it.

makes me glad that I am 12.

I played rs07 when I was 6 (7 after halloween).
[/quote]may i ask who te fudge introduced you to rs at that young age??¿
[/quote]My brotha[/quote]ohhh explains alot.
also bump

Read full topic
